sesu tharaga jaya parajayen thorawa awasanwa atha.shri lanka jathika pila niyojanaya kala di.es da silwa (wels kumara) saha dulip mendis (sa.sebasthiyan) moratu ran satanata ekwu parani kridakayan wethi.wels kumara widuhale nilantha bopage lakunu 179k ha sa.sebasthiyan widuhale jeral mendis lakunu 148k me tharagayedi wadima lakunu raskara thibe.wels kumara widuhale sarath pranandu me tharagawaliyedi 1964 wasaredi thama pasala wenuwen lakunu 103k ha lakunu 66kata kadulu 10k dawaganimin wadima dakshatha dakwa atha.me tharagayedi wels kumara palamu jaya 1935di wartha wana athara sa.sebasthiyan palamu jaya wartha wanne 1962diya..

eheth giya janadhipathiwarana prathipala samaga ee ena yojana ratata awashya nidahasa manawa ayithiwasikam rate janathawata biyak sakak nathiwa sathutin inna puluwan ratak hadanna wuwamana wuna. 30, 40, 50, 60 dashakawala sita kagahapu warin wara nagunu kalakolahala aragala bawata pathwuna.

ehi pappala ranak innawa gamata pappa gama kiyanawa ee pappala joli wada karanawa mokada balan inne kattiya ekathuwela math ekka kiyamu.

ese pawasanne emfasis hi eekabaddha pradhana sanwardhana niladhari dinesh wen gopal mahathayi.shri lankawa thula emfasis aayathanayata awashya parisaraya godanagimata sahayogaya laba dun shri lanka aayojana mandalayata apage sthuthiya pala karanawa yayi da hethema pawasayi.aayojana mandalaye sabhapathi ha adhyaksha janaral dhammika perera adahas dakwamin ‘shri lanka aayojana mandalaya shri lankawe thorathuru thakshana ha wyapara bahirakarana kriyawali sewa kshethrayehi sanwardhanaya udesa pragami bhumikawakawa nirathawa sitina bawa‘ pawasiya.emfasis shri lankawa samanga aayojana hawulkarayeku wima mema kshethraya sambandhayen dakwiya haki ;handama udaharana yayi da kiya.

ekama kshethrayanhi wisheshagnya danumin sannaddha wu kiyuri yuwala wiwidha paryeshanangayanhi niyalemin dawasin adakatath wada siya rasayanagara thula wiwidha paryeshanayanhi niyalima pradhanathama karyaya wu athara wiwekaya sandaha hakitharam durak papadi padimath, widesha sancharayanhi nirathawimath owunge winodanshawi atha.
polisiye warada hindayi ehema wenne kiyala rohitha abegunawardhana mahaththaya kiyanawa.
me awulata yojana wana wisandum deshapalanikaya.
aya siya hoten age alankara pihatu piruwaya.
ee aakarayatama siduwiyayuththe margagatha adhyapanaya labimata apahasu daruwanta eeta kramawedayak sakasamin margagatha adhyapanaya pawathwagena yama noweda?
me sandaha illumpath idiripath kirime wishesha kriyawaliyak natha.
mama punchi kale, loku ayiya wennath kaliyen maye hithe ape ammata aththamma (thaththage amma) ara kiyapu pada tika kiyala thiyenawa.
pada sho nathuwa rupiyal 100 hari ee lamayage ekawunt ekata yawamu...
ema bhu kampanaya dina 12 k athulatha ema pradeshayata balapa thunwana bhu kampanaya bawayi wartha wanne.
ehi godak wadi diyunu kala dewal thibe (ba)
niwtan mama yanda kalin eyage gitar eka mata dunna.

ee thiyenne 12 pradhana wishwawidyalaye ha shasthriya idiripath langa pahatha thadasanna pradeshawala pihiti widyala, kida saha melbarn sisun ha pitaya sandaha nawathan pahasukam pasekin sanskruthika wadasatahan.
oyath me wade kotaskaruwek wima hungak watinawa.
mama angata atha thiyala katha kala.
duwili nowadina nisayi.
eka dawasak eya mokak hari kiyanawa kiyanawa mama piligannema na.
thorathuru, ithihasaya apata nama mathrika sandahanak karanu wina ithuru karanu labu dayada
mulu jiwithema dinna kiyala umbaa hithan hitiyata umbaa paradila macho...
pasehi situwimata pera, dadu kabali mul sadima uththejanaya kirimata upakari wana oonama sudanamakin salakanu labe, udaharanayak lesa kornewin, kornerost ho ruts.
pradhana warthawa sakasana ladde wartha thunehima karunu pilibandawa ema kandayam thunama samaga dirgha washayen pawathwana lada sakachcha walin pasuwaya.
